name: Super Space Armada
description:
Welcome to Super Space Armada!


A Top-Down 2D space shooter game.

Where players can choose from one of six ships from different races, each with their own unique combat abilities and stats. Including Humans, Hive, Cephalons, Vultarii, Kratakos, and Dragomir.


Players will purchase ships with star tokens and build an armada. Once final purchases are made players will select a ship from their armada and battle until they defeat their opponents or are utterly annihilated themselves.


Players will battle with the opposing star commander and encounter the dangers of asteroid storms, the boon of power up bonanza's and more surprises await those who fight through the tournament!
